pages.description: Displays a list of stored usernames and allows adding new ones.
requirements: Display username list in a scrollable container
Include a text input field for adding new usernames
Add a button to submit new usernames
Validate user input to prevent empty or duplicate usernames
Display a notification or error message for invalid input
Use a visually appealing layout with adequate spacing and typography
Implement responsive design for various screen sizes and devices
Store and retrieve usernames from local storage
Handle cases where local storage is full or unavailable

pages.description: Optional page with information about the application (not explicitly mentioned but could be a good addition for a real application, however since it's not required it can be removed)
requirements: Page title is 'About'
Page contains a brief description of the application
Page has a link to return to the main page
Visually appealing design is maintained throughout the page

pages.description: Displays a list of stored usernames and allows adding new ones.
requirements: The page should display a list of stored usernames
The page should have a text input field to add new usernames
The page should have a button to submit new usernames
The page should store usernames in local storage
The page should have a visually appealing design
The list of usernames should be updated in real-time when a new username is added
The page should handle cases where the local storage is empty or null
The page should display an error message if the username is already in the list
The page should display an error message if the username is empty or invalid
